guidelines.title: Guidelines
guidelines.intro: When writing your answer, please consider the following guidelines.
list: Make sure the answer is relevant to the product and question
If applicable, include the model number.

avoid.title: Please avoid:
avoid.text: Profanity or spiteful remarks, obscene or distateful content. Personal information like email addresses and phone numbers. Sharing URLâ€™s and information about other companies and websites. Telling customer to shop elsewhere.
